name: Larva Match
description:
Larva Match: Match-2 Puzzle Game

Greetings, future Larvarians! Now meet Larva Friends on your phone!
Stay tuned and be the first to play our New and Fun match-2 puzzle game with Larva Friends.

Features:
● [Bored of typical match-3 games?] Larva Match is a mobile match-2 puzzle game with simple, but definitely not monotonous, rules to play! Tap-tap two cards with same pictures, use items to clear the stage before time is up.
● [Larvly Larva Friends] Every Larva hero has its own skill and costume. Collect and power up ‘em all with stars gained per stage and daily rewards. How strong can your crew get?
● [So many episodes, so much fun] Time-attack, boss raid, and missions – 360 stages and more awaiting your touch!
● [Challenge the world, become a champion] Join real-time battle mode and call out the world to duel!

Follow Official Larva Match pages, be the first Larvarian:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LarvaMatchPuzzle
- Youtube: https://youtu.be/ZTIxKBXK-co
For more Larva animation: https://www.youtube.com/user/Larva2011ani
